generated_body: In the article titled "Divers salvage 100-year-old liquor from WWI shipwreck," the user is likely to read about a team of divers who have recently recovered bottles of alcohol from a shipwreck dating back to World War I. Additionally, it could discuss the challenges faced by the divers during the salvage operation and the condition of the bottles recovered. This article may also provide insights into what this discovery means for maritime archaeology and the preservation of history.
